e: ￹`Ma~`harateng~ `nira~ `ko~ `sowal~ `ako~.￺He remembered what I said.￻他想到我的話
￹`Haratengen~ `ko~ `sowal~ `nira~.￺Don't forget; remember what he said.￻他是要我考慮(思考)什麼，要記住他的話
￹`O~ `papi~`harateng~ `nira~ `i~ `takowanan~ `to~ `so'elin~`ay~ `a~ `demak~ `konini~.￺What he is doing is making me consider what I really ought to do.￻他是要我考慮(思想)什麼是我該做的
￹`nao~ `harateng~ `ako~ `i~￺what I had thought was...￻我原來的想法是…
d.f: ￹￺thoughts * thinking * point of view￻想法，思想
